text: "Leave Me Alone" is a song by American singer Michael Jackson. It was released as the eighth single from Jackson's seventh album Bad in 1987. It reached number two in the UK Singles Chart. In Ireland it reached number one. The music video is featured on the 1988 movie Moonwalker. The video won a Grammy Award in 1990 for Best Short Form Music Video. ==References== Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:1987 songs
